# klevu-product-grid

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Component to place products on grid

## Properties

| Property      | Attribute       | Description                                    | Type                  | Default     |
| ------------- | --------------- | ---------------------------------------------- | --------------------- | ----------- |
| `itemsPerRow` | `items-per-row` | Place products in grid with this many products | `number \| undefined` | `undefined` |
